Function reference version 1.1.0

Main functions

barplot.tess3Q
Barplot representation of a Q-matrix
CreatePalette
Create a list of palettes
ggtess3Q
Display geographic maps of ancestry coefficients using the ggplot grammar
ImputeRandom
ImputeRound
Impute missing values
plot.tess3
Plot cross-validation errors for all values of number of ancestral populations
plot.tess3Q
Display geographic maps of ancestry coefficients
pvalue
Get p-values from a genome scan for selection
qmatrix
Get Q matrix estimate
tess2tess3
Import input files from the STRUCTURE and TESS formats
tess3
Estimate ancestry coefficients and run genome scans for selection
